name: Toxic Fusion Alpha Demo
description:
Toxic Fusion (Alpha Demo)

This demo will be available for public download on December 20.

Intense Combat and High Speed Platforming

Change your movement mode at any time to adapt to the challenges that come your way. Good is not enough, this game will demand perfection if you want to be able to stop the Toxic Plague, otherwise go home. Overcome the apocalypse, win the Armageddon, reclaim the earth and CHALLENGE THE GODS.

Mode is the key                                 Combat Mode                                                              Race Mode

If you want to succeed, you must learn how to manage these movement modes properly.

The Story 

In the year 2050, amid the chaos caused by a massive plague of toxic beasts, the highest scientists finally manage to awaken the most destructive weapon ever conceived, Alpha-Toxic Death-01. This heartless hyper soldier is considered a new opportunity for the survival of humanity. Toxic Death must completely exterminate the nation's plague on his own before things get too complicated, and prepare for something far worse.

                                 Toxic Death, the next step of human evolution.
